opportunities.scholarshipsDesc: We connect survivors with education scholarships and bursaries to support their return to school.
opportunities.techDesc: Join beginner-friendly tech programs and coding bootcamps for girls ready to build their future.
opportunities.mentorshipDesc: Access women mentors in health, tech, and education to guide and inspire your journey.
opportunities.reentryDesc: Personalized help to rejoin school after dropping out due to early pregnancy or other challenges.
